column2:
"I'm truly grateful that you always accept
these so readily!"

"If my forecast is correct, this meteorological
observation mission will be quite risky. Please
take every precaution against serious burns."

"It's important that you get me the data I need,
but your life is obviously more important, so..."

"Please don't needlessly put yourself in
harm's way."

"いつも気軽に引き受けていただいて
本当にありがとうございます！"

"でも、僕の予測が正しいと
かなり危険な観察になるはずです。
火傷には充分、注意してくださいね！"

"僕の観察も大事ですけど
<%me>さんの
身体はもっと大事だし……"
"くれぐれも無理はしないでくださいね！"
